#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>
#define lli long long

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,k;
    lli x,sum,cnt,ans;
    cin >> t;
    for ( int l = 1; l <= t; l++ ) {
        cin >> n >> k;
        priority_queue < lli, vector<lli>, greater<lli> > pq;
        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) cin >> x, pq.push(x);
        int val = (n-k)/(k-1) + ((n-k)%(k-1) != 0);
        val = k + (k-1)*val - n;
        for ( int i = 0; i < val; i++ ) pq.push(0);
        ans = 0;
        while ( pq.size() > 1 ) {
             sum = cnt = 0;
             while ( cnt != k ) {
                   sum += pq.top();
                   cnt++;
                   pq.pop();
             }
             pq.push(sum);
             ans += sum;
        }
        cout << "Case " << l << ": " << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
